short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save a Claude chat transcript as an HTML file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This adds a small 'Download' button to the top of chat transcripts on Claude.ai.

When you click the button, the entire chat will be saved as an HTML file. You can save that for later, or even open it and print it.

This extension is not created or authorized by Anthropic, the creators of Claude.
